content: SNOW HERE, SNOW THERE.  SNOW, SNOW EVERYWHERE. Hit all 50 States.  Florida, Louisiana, Alabama, Mississippi, even Hawaii, because of the historic North Gulf snowstorm.  You tell me if climate change is not an issue?  I hope we’re not entering the ICE AGE.  Stay safe.  Peace out.
